name: Adventure of the Corona
description:
I would like to present the  “Adventure of the Corona” indie python pygame project,  version playable beta. The game was created during the quarantine period and it`s still under the development. 

"You are young adventurer, who wakes up this morning in the wet, cold cave. Strange blue gnom is watching you. When you approach to him, he tells you about the curse called corona disease which affected kingom of Lapalmix. The next steps of your adventure will be related to the search for a solution to a raging epidemic"

This is the real-time 2d top down role playing game, you can choose between the classic characters: Knight, Wizard and Thief and adjust difficulty setting at start. Use 'W,S,A,D' keys to move, 'SPACE' to hit and C key to toggle between spell and physical attack. Use your inventory, spell and quest book with mouse control. Always during the game you can pause with a button or 'P' key. Use 'ESC' key to quit.
